channel.title: Make Knight CS fail if redirected
channel.description:
https://i.imgur.com/9khHNor.png There's nothing more frustrating than having your target right before you try to kill someone as a knight Even worse your logs look like they completely clear a possibly evil player of suspicious.
To combat this can we please give the knight some restraint and have him decide NOT to CS if his target is switched via debauchery/tornado?

item.description:
I think that knight needs a new ability over CS, because they have no way of learning anything the court can’t

(2 uses) if either of your two targets are not blue dragon, you will kill both.

item.title: Make Knight CS fail if redirected
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
It’s left up to the player to use their abilities correctly and choose the frequency with which they use them. Rather than blaming the mechanic, it would be better to take a look at the ability’s uses and assess whether or not it would be a good idea to use it every night or not (and who on), and encourage your fellow players to do the same.
